product_name: Hi-Tec Palo Alto EZ Shoes - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for exploring forest trails and or neighborhood parks, the Hi-Tec Palo Alto EZ Kids' Shoes provide breathable coverage and a comfortable fit for budding adventurers on the go. Suede leather and mesh uppers offer durability and flexibility; synthetic linings wick moisture away from feet for additional comfort. Stretch cord laces adjust quickly for a custom fit and secure snugly with a locking toggle. Removable EVA insoles work in tandem with the rubber and EVA midsoles to deliver cushioning and support for long days of play. Carbon rubber outsoles on the Hi-Tec Palo Alto EZ Kids' Shoes offer solid traction on various surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Great for exploring forest trails and or neighborhood parks, the Hi-Tec Palo Alto EZ Kids' Shoes provide breathable coverage and a comfortable fit for budding adventurers on the go.
